item.title: SilverNeedle Hospitality has introduced its second Sage Hotel in Perth
item.description:
Source: SilverNeedle Hospitality. SilverNeedle Hospitality, based in Singapore, is expanding its upscale Sage Hotel brand in Perth, Western Australia, with a second location. This announcement comes just weeks after the brand launched with a hotel in Brisbane. item.title: Introducing the Healthy MICE Programme by SilverNeedle Hospitality
item.description:

item.title: SilverNeedle Hospitality introduces the new Sage Hotel brand, catering specifically to upscale business travelers
item.description:
